amendment.description: Amendment makes available $3 million to the FDA Center for Veterinary Medicine for research on antibiotic resistance related to animal drugs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 38 printed in the Congressional Record to direct the FDA to allocate $3 million for the Center for Veterinary Medicine from its total funding for FY 2001.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown (OH) amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
